channel.title: Mirai Botnet Source Code
channel.description:
I guess you have heard about the Mirai BotNet. Everybody was talking about it because of some massive DDoS from IoT devices. Then, early this month, its source code was released:
https://github.com/jgamblin/Mirai-Source-Code
Finally, I manage to take a look to the source code and... there is a lot of interesting stuff in there!!!
Take a look and post your questions in this thread if you have doubts on some part of the code!
* Do you know how the bot figures out the target platform? * Do you know what those IAC are? * Which DoS implements the bot?
Lot's of fun in a few lines of code :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:

item.title: Mirai Botnet Source Code
item.dc:creator: 0x00pf
item.description:
I guess you have heard about the Mirai BotNet. Everybody was talking about it because of some massive DDoS from IoT devices. Then, early this month, its source code was released:

GitHub

jgamblin/Mirai-Source-Code

Leaked Mirai Source Code for Research/IoC Development Purposes - jgamblin/Mirai-Source-Code

Finally, I manage to take a look to the source code and… there is a lot of interesting stuff in there!!!

Take a look and post your questions in this thread if you have doubts on some part of the code!

  • Do you know how the bot figures out the target platform?
  • Do you know what those IAC are?
  • Which DoS implements the bot?

Lot’s of fun in a few lines of code

Read full topic
